channel.title: I need help with monster drops!
channel.description: how do i make a monster drop a item i dont know why it aint working and how do u make a weapon hit twice like the dds spec but i would like to know it for a normal weapon thx

item.title: I need help with monster drops!
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

public void DDSdouble() { if( playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6898 && specialEnable == true && zenziedoublehit == true) { hit1 = 20 + misc.random(20);//2x hit hit2 = 20 + misc.random(20);//2x hit startAnimation(1337);//animation stillgfx(337, EnemyX2, EnemyY2);//creates gfx on the NPC? }

monster drops are handled in item2 item3 and npchandler

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with monster drops!

thanks 4 the help anyways

item.title: I need help with monster drops!
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

to make a normal weapon hit twice ppl mass like some servers have a time on it between hits and others dont if u click 5 times in 2 secs while fighting u will hit about 3 times really fast the dds spec is just controled to hit 2 times ea time the spec is activated
